dc:title: Day After Day - February 1935
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Notes the many visitors to the Catholic Worker--a Socialist, a bishop, priests, others--small miracles and conversations.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 214 1935-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
